alert.note: Alert for Saratoga; Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 2:19AM EST until December 20 at 2:20PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at Hadley. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Water reaches moderate flood stage inundating East River Road in several spots. Water also floods Old Bend Road in the Town of Moreau. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.1 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Hadley Flood Stage: 14.0 Observed Stage at Tue 2 am: 16.8 Forecast: Tue 7 am 17.1 Tue 1 pm 17.1 Tue 7 pm 16.6 Wed 1 am 15.4 Wed 7 am 14.2 Wed 1 pm 13.3 Wed 7 pm 12.6 Thu 1 am 11.8 Thu 7 am 11.1 Thu 1 pm 10.4 Thu 7 pm 9.8 &&
